verses.verse: And it shall come to <S%H1697>pass<s%>, when all these things are <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H1293>thee<s%>, the blessing and the <S%H7045>curse<s%>, which I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7725>thee<s%>, and thou shalt call them to <S%H3824>mind<s%> among all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, whither <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath driven <S%H5080>thee<s%>,

and shalt <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and shalt <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> according to all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, thou and thy <S%H1121>children<s%>, with all thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>;

that then <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7725>turn<s%> thy <S%H7622>captivity<s%>, and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> upon <S%H7725>thee<s%>, and will return and <S%H6908>gather<s%> thee from all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, whither <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath scattered <S%H6327>thee<s%>.

If any of thine <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> be in the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> parts of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, from thence will <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3947>thee<s%>, and from thence will he fetch thee:

and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> thee into the <S%H776>land<s%> which thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3423>possessed<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3190>it<s%>; and he will do thee good, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thee above thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4135>circumcise<s%> thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>, to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> with all thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H2416>live<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>put<s%> all these <S%H423>curses<s%> upon thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and on them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7291>thee<s%>, that persecuted thee.

And thou shalt <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> all his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will make thee <S%H3498>plenteous<s%> in all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H990>body<s%>, and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>ground<s%>, for <S%H2896>good<s%>: for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> over thee for <S%H2896>good<s%>, as he <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> over thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>;

if thou shalt <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which are <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%>; if thou <S%H7725>turn<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> with all thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and with all thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
For this <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, it is not too <S%H6381>hard<s%> for <S%H7350>thee<s%>, neither is it far off.

It is not in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, that thou shouldest <S%H559>say<s%>, Who shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> for us to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H3947>bring<s%> it unto <S%H8085>us<s%>, and make us to hear <S%H6213>it<s%>, that we may do it?

Neither is it <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, that thou shouldest <S%H559>say<s%>, Who shall <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5676>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> for <S%H3947>us<s%>, and bring it unto <S%H8085>us<s%>, and make us to hear <S%H6213>it<s%>, that we may do it?
But the <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7138>nigh<s%> unto <S%H6310>thee<s%>, in thy mouth, and in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, that thou mayest do <S%H6213>it<s%>.
See <S%H7200><s%>, I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%>, and <S%H4194>death<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%>;

in that I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H2421>live<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%>, and that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee in the <S%H776>land<s%> whither thou <S%H935>goest<s%> in to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

But if thy <S%H3824>heart<s%> turn <S%H6437>away<s%>, and thou wilt not <S%H8085>hear<s%>, but shalt be drawn <S%H5080>away<s%>, and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and serve <S%H5647>them<s%>;

I <S%H5046>denounce<s%> unto you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that ye shall <S%H6>surely<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>; ye shall not <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%>, whither thou passest <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> in to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

I <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H5749>witness<s%> against you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee <S%H2416>life<s%> and <S%H4194>death<s%>, the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and the <S%H7045>curse<s%>: therefore <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%>, that thou mayest <S%H2421>live<s%>, thou and thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>;

to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and to <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto <S%H2416>him<s%>; for he is thy life, and the <S%H753>length<s%> of thy <S%H3117>days<s%>; that thou mayest <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, to <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, to give <S%H5414>them<s%>.
